name: surprise-mulch
effect: Increases the chance of Berry mutation.
short_effect: Increases the chance of Berry mutation.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Mulch to be used in a Berry field.
It causes strange, sudden mutations
based on the combination of Berries.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears
to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and
has no effect.

to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and
has no effect.
